about_the_game:
Worker 42 is a single-player first-person exploration game.
Use your scanner to find your way in the interstellar darkness of space.
Repair the various systems of the station, complete your tasks and return to Earth.
But something seems wrong on this planet.

Use the scanner provided by the SCC to find your way in the interstellar darkness of space.

Receive your tasks directly on your Digital Mission Assistant.

Do the job and return to Earth, a routine mission in short, but something seems wrong on this planet.

THE STORY

You are a worker (registration number #42) of the Stellar Communication Corporation (SCC for short)
You have been sent to an "intermediate" planet where an autonomous communication station is installed.
This station is a relay of the complex space communication network established a long time ago by the SCC.
But lately it seems to be down, no signal has been received for several weeks.
After a 79-day journey, you are sent there to do maintenance.
The problem is, you have been sent to the nightside of this distant planet.
But don't worry, you will be safe, no one lives on this planet.

The SCC is proud of all its workers and strives to provide them with optimal conditions and quality tools.
